actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent the international double taxation of income subject to the alternative minimum tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the credit for prior year minimum tax liability by the credit not allowed by the alternative minimum foreign tax credit.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent the international double taxation of income subject to the alternative minimum tax.
